TopicTitle: How ksp'ers have a YouTube channel.

Articles.Content: Cool to find out how many people have YouTube channels.

Yes, but I don't upload.

More like a YouTube channel that's just there for no good reason. I might upload some stuff there someday, if I get any content.
Yup. I plan on uploading my first proper vid soon, as my only video ATM is a 6 second solar panel test animation.
I recommend refining the poll to "Do you have a KSP YouTube channel?". I do have a YouTube channel, but so does everyone who uses GMail now, so I'm not sure that information's very helpful.
I'm uploading my 100th KSP vid (actually it's more than that, but my 100th in a series) on Tuesday.
i have one but i havent uploaded anything in years, no ksp content.

I've got a channel with pretty much all KSP vids.

Actually there was a thread a while back to support people's channels. Aughta give that a bump. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55431-We-need-viewers!
I've a few channels. The relevant one is in my .sig Kerbal Space Program LP's going back to 0.16
